search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Discord (discord.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Discord can be found at this URL: [https://discord.com/nitro](https://discord.com/nitro)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
From clips to pics, share away with bigger file uploads

![Image 1: From clips to pics, share away with bigger file uploads](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/65a8f1d5429528ae89f64cf0_Clips%20to%20pics.svg)

![Image 72](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c0bef3ac44f5d1acbb35b_Vector.svg)

![Image 73](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c109da93ff46336b02e84_Tag.svg)

What’s Nitro?

![Image 74](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

Nitro is a subscription service that unlocks features and perks across Discord, giving you more ways to have fun and express yourself.

How does Nitro work?

![Image 75](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

When you subscribe to Nitro, you get access to features that were previously locked for you - like using custom emoji anywhere, uploading bigger files, setting a custom video background, and more. When the subscription ends, you’ll lose access to the perks.

What’s the difference between Nitro and Nitro Basic?

![Image 76](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

Nitro is our most popular plan that unlocks access to all available Nitro perks, and Nitro Basic includes a selection of the most-loved Nitro perks that help you better express yourself. See the comparison chart above for a full breakdown!

How much does Nitro cost?

![Image 77](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

Cost varies depending on your country and plan. You can check Nitro prices under User Settings \> Nitro in either the desktop or mobile apps.

Where can I buy Nitro?

![Image 78](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

You can purchase Nitro by visiting the Nitro tab in User Settings, or in the Nitro page under Home on desktop. On mobile, visit User Settings by tapping your user icon in the bottom bar, then select Get Nitro.

What payment methods do you accept?

![Image 79](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

We accept a variety of payment methods, which you can learn more info on [here](https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/360017693772)!

Do you offer Nitro and Nitro Basic in localized pricing?

![Image 80](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

We are constantly working to expand the availability of localized pricing for Nitro and Nitro Basic. Check [this article](https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/4407269525911) for information on where localized pricing is currently available.

Are Nitro gifts real?

![Image 81](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

Yes! You can purchase a Nitro gift through the Nitro page on desktop or the Nitro Gifting tab within mobile under User Settings. Additionally, you can send a quick gift in a channel by selecting the gift icon on desktop or mobile. If someone sends you a gift, you can see what it looks like [here](https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/360020877112). You can also buy Discord Nitro directly on Amazon.com (United States only).

How can I buy a Discord Nitro gift card on Amazon.com?

![Image 82](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

Nitro gift cards on Amazon are a great way to gift Nitro to a friend, or have someone gift Nitro to you. Just click [this link](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CF4J58QK?maas=maas_adg_DE3B8B6262C4DC306922DC26C0CE6A2D_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas&th=1) for a variety of Discord gift options, from 1 to 12-month Nitro subscriptions. Learn more about Discord gift cards on Amazon in this [Help Center article](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020877112).

Where to redeem Nitro codes?

![Image 83](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

You can redeem your Nitro code on the desktop and web apps through the Gift Inventory page in User Settings.

Can I get free Nitro from a bot or a giveaway?

![Image 84](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

The only official way to receive Nitro is through a [gift](https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/360020877112) sent to you in chat, or by receiving a code that can be redeemed under Gift Inventory in User Settings on the desktop and web apps. We strongly encourage not clicking on any links from people you don’t know well. For more tips on staying safe on Discord, visit our [Safety](https://discord.com/safetycenter) page.

Does Discord offer Nitro Promotions?

![Image 85](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

We are always working on ways to give you more with Nitro! Keep an eye out in the app, on our [Twitter](https://twitter.com/discord) , [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/discord), or [blog](https://discord.com/blog) to see when new promotions go live. :)

My Nitro subscription comes with Boosts. What are those?

![Image 86](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

Server Boosts are a way to show support for your favorite communities. Each Boost that you give to a server helps collectively unlock perks for everyone in the server to enjoy. Learn more about Server Boosting [here](https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/360028038352)!

Are Boosts permanent?

![Image 87](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

A Nitro subscription only comes with 2 Boosts that you can share to any server you belong to. The Boosts do not stack over time, and they are not permanent. You’ll get to keep the Boosts for as long as your Nitro subscription is active.

Why is my Nitro not working?

![Image 88](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6257adef93867e50d84d30e2/633c1afc2642cd62d5e785bb_Vector%20(18).svg)

If you’re having any trouble with your subscription, or have any questions, you can [reach out](https://dis.gd/billing) to our team and we’ll be happy to help!

Enhance your Discord experience with Nitro — get custom emojis, animated avatars, larger file uploads, HD screensharing, and more.
